thread.title: ‘Loving’ Director Jeff Nichols Launches Arkansas Cinema Society, With a Festival in 2018 — Exclusive
thread.title_full: ‘Loving’ Director Jeff Nichols Launches Arkansas Cinema Society, With a Festival in 2018 — Exclusive

author: Anne Thompson
title: ‘Loving’ Director Jeff Nichols Launches Arkansas Cinema Society, With a Festival in 2018 — Exclusive
text: Even as nonprofit arts organizations are under attack, the filmmaker is drawing inspiration from Richard Linklater's Austin Film Society to launch a year-round cinema organization in Arkansas.
